europeana:record.dc:title: A Miocene molluscan faunule from Caucagua (Miranda State, Venezuela), with the description of a new species of Tryonia (Mollusca, Gastropoda)
Various articles
europeana:record.dc:creator: Wesselingh F.P.
Macsotay O.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Miocene
Venezuela
Gastropoda
Tryonia
new species
Cumaca Formation
europeana:record.dc:description: A molluscan faunule from the Miocene Cumaca Formation of the western margin of the Tuy Basin (Venezuela) is described. The fauna yields two species of freshwater snails and a single terrestrial snail species. Tryonia vivasi nov. spec. is described from the fauna, and its biogeographical significance is discussed.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A Miocene molluscan faunule from Caucagua (Miranda State, Venezuela), with the description of a new species of Tryonia (Mollusca, Gastropoda) (URN:ISSN:1570-0399) (Volume 4) (Issue 1-2)
